titles.title: As The Spirit Of The Lord Moves

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As the Spirit of the LORD moves in my heart.
I will praise as David praised.
(repeat)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I will praise.
I will praise.
I will praise as David praised.
(repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
As the Spirit of the LORD moves in my heart.
I will dance as David danced.
(repeat)

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
I will dance.
I will dance.
I will dance as David danced.
(repeat)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
As the Spirit of the LORD moves in my heart.
I will sing as David sang.
(repeat)

verse.name: c3
verse.lines:
I will sing.
I will sing.
I will sing as David sang.
(repeat)
